STATION_NOT_CONTRACTED.description: Telemetry originates from a station/sensor not covered by an active contract/allowlist.

CALIBRATION_MISSING.description: Telemetry missing required calibration reference or calibration is invalid.

PROVENANCE_MISSING.description: Telemetry or derived metric missing required provenance reference.

PARAM_LOCK_MISSING.description: Derived metric/alert publication missing params_hash (reproducibility lock).

MINIMAL_DISCLOSURE_REQUIRED.description: Request includes overly precise location or unnecessary fields beyond policy.
